name: War of Choices
description:
It is a top-down shooter game where you control an ambitious bot of faction BitM.A.C, who have been in conflict with the advanced terminal race L.I.A. The leader, L.I.A. Prime, is rooting out for you to change the meaning of war for once, and end the abomination.

Submitted for Epic Winter Jam 2019 (theme: "All's Fair In Love and War")
